name: metadata
description: Information about the Entity and the product where the entity was created.

children.name: collected_timestamp
children.description: GMT timestamp when the entity information was collected.

children.name: creation_timestamp
children.description: GMT timestamp when the entity described by the product_entity_id was created.

children.name: product_entity_id
children.description: A vendor-specific identifier that uniquely identifies the entity.

children.name: threat
children.description: Metadata provided by a threat intelligence feed.
